description: This schema represents the random experience questions for the MD2K smoking detection study.

references.description: Add a reference to a standard vocabulary term, if applicable (e.g., Tobacco smoking behavior (finding) for questionnaires that explore smoking behavior).

first_question_item.description: Include here the question type to be used.

second_question_item.description: Include here the question type to be used.

definitions.description: Add as many items as needed, choosing them from the generic set and customizing as needed (see below).

some_value_set.description: Define code set used by more than one question.

items.description: Add as many items as needed, based on the questionnaire's definition.

enum.label: Specify here the question code (e.g., EXPSmo).
enum.text: Specify here the question text (e.g., Have you smoked since the last time you recorded anything on the phone?).

answer.description: Specify answer type (text, number, time, date) or value set (categories, scale), or referenced defines code set, as applicable.

date_time.description: Create one property for each of the question-level timestamp you need: for ex.,  date_time_asked, date_time_answered.
